name: Karakoram Prime Connect S + 2 Sets Quiver Connectors - Men's
categories: Prime Connect S + 2 Sets Quiver Connectors
description: Innovation delivered from Karakoram. These high-end bindings have a reponsive but soft feel, and it takes only seconds to swap them from board to board. No tools are needed to make the switch, and it's easier to stack your quiver compactly when you travel. Part of the Prime All-mountain series, the Prime Connect Bindings are ready to perform on any of your resort boards.Prime Connect S has a softer flex for a playful ride.Mounts to standard 4 x 4 snowboard hole pattern.Accomodate angles of 30° to -30°.Dupont Zytel sidewall offers dampening to handle resort conditions.Open chassis doesn't interfere with board flex.High-strength aluminum and stainless steel offers great precision at a low weight.Underfoot EVA layer provides dampening.PU Leather ankle and Air-Form toe straps provide a snug fit.Includes 2 sets of Quiver-connectors.
